intro: Delosperma steytlerae, commonly known as the Steytlerteppich, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae and is characterized by its fleshy, water-storing leaves that form a dense mat. The plant produces vibrant flowers in shades of pink and purple, typically blooming in summer. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for rock gardens. Its drought tolerance and low maintenance requirements make it suitable for arid environments.
